# activeExternalDisplayFrameRate

**Instance Property**

The currently configured frame rate on the external display that’s displaying the preview layer.

## Declaration

```swift
var activeExternalDisplayFrameRate: Double { get }
```

## Discussion

Observe this property to determine if the configured frame rate matches the max frame rate ([doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureDevice/activeVideoMinFrameDuration]) of the device. When the [doc://com.apple.avfoundation/documentation/AVFoundation/AVCaptureExternalDisplayConfigurator/isActive] property becomes `false`, this property changes to 0.

## Inspecting the configurator

- **device**: The device for which the coordinator configures the preview layer.
- **isActive**: This property tells you whether the configurator is actively configuring the external display.
- **previewLayer**: The layer for which the configurator adjusts display properties to match the device’s state.
